thread.title: Shares fragile, US budget deal hits bonds

title: Shares fragile, US budget deal hits bonds
text:
Shares fragile, US budget deal hits bonds Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:39 
World stock markets remained on shaky ground on Thursday as U.S. bond yields crept back towards four-year highs after U.S. congressional leaders reached a two-year budget deal to raise government spending by almost $300 billion. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
World stock markets remained on shaky ground on Thursday as U.S. bond yields crept back towards four-year highs after U.S. congressional leaders reached a two-year budget deal to raise government spending by almost $300 billion.
